Hero.title: Talshir-IBC
Hero.description: Development, manufacturing and marketing of unique products in the construction industry.
Hero.highlight: All products hold unique patents and exclusive designs.

About.title: About Talshir
About.innovation: Talshir - Ilan Bar Ltd. was founded in 1994. Initially, the company focused on constructing high-rise residential buildings and private homes in Israel. Over the years, with extensive hands-on experience in the operational and engineering fields, the company identified opportunities to advance and develop work processes. As part of its activities, the company began designing and developing unique and exclusive products aimed at improving construction processes, work quality, cost reduction, and providing a variety of solutions for the construction industry. Our products represent a breakthrough and innovation and are successfully marketed in the leading construction companies in Israel.

WhyUs.title: Why Choose Our Products
WhyUs.description: We provide cutting-edge solutions for leading construction companies and private developers in Israel.

card1.title: Unique Designs
card1.description: Innovative, high-quality, and eco-friendly materials, engineered for durability and efficiency in modern construction.

card2.title: Expert Guidance
card2.description: Our experienced engineers and designers work closely with clients, offering tailored solutions and expert advice at every stage.

card3.title: Reliable Delivery
card3.description: We ensure fast, secure, and transparent delivery with blockchain-backed tracking, keeping your projects on schedule.

card4.title: Global Standards
card4.description: Trusted by international construction leaders, our products meet the highest global quality and safety benchmarks.

card5.title: Customer Focus
card5.description: We prioritize client needs, offering personalized support, responsive service, and a commitment to long-term satisfaction.

card6.title: Strong Partnerships
card6.description: Collaborating with industry leaders, we develop solutions that integrate seamlessly with evolving construction demands.

Coops.title: Our Clients
Coops.description: Empowering top construction companies and private developers with advanced, innovative solutions that enhance efficiency, sustainability, and project success.

Products.title: Our Products
Products.description: We specialize in the design and development of unique and exclusive products designed to improve construction processes, work quality, reduce costs and provide a variety of solutions for the construction industry.

ProductsList.modelDescription: High-quality Dividag pipe for Dividag bolt and maintains distance between opposite formwork.
modelUsage: Prevents concrete from entering the metal ducts.

ProductsList.modelDescription: Seal for water and gases under high pressure for Dividag pipe in concrete walls.
modelUsage: Suitable for a variety of casting molds.

ProductsList.modelDescription: High-quality spacer for formwork in concrete walls.
modelUsage: Suitable for a variety of bolt diameters.

ProductsList.modelDescription: High-quality and strong spacer for the lower mesh in concrete floors + clip for concrete walls.
modelUsage: Ensures stability before and after casting.

ProductsList.modelDescription: Bench for upper iron in concrete floors with thickness (19-30cm).
modelUsage: Suitable for a variety of precast concrete elements.

ProductsList.modelDescription: Flexible and high-quality seal for Dividag pipe.
modelUsage: Reduces the need for manual measurements.

ProductsList.modelDescription: Spacer for the lower mesh for heavy iron loads in massive ceilings.
Spacer mounted on the pipe by pressing with a 360-degree rotation mechanism.
Spacer with a diameter of (8cm) suitable for all concrete elements in the building.
modelUsage: Prevents corrosion by maintaining proper cover.

ProductsList.modelDescription: Protection sleeve for porcelain granite in wall cladding.
modelUsage: Suitable for a variety of construction applications.
End accessory for pipe passage in exterior walls.

ProductsList.modelDescription: Plastic clip mounted on the plaster corner that allows adjustment in two wall planes.
Allows easy and quick mounting and adjustment of micas with maximum precision.
Wheel with a diameter of 110mm, keeps the iron cage out of contact with the ground.

Certifications.customColors: Available in a variety of colors

left.content: Based in **Hod HaSharon, Israel**, Talshir-IBC partners with clients across the globe to bring patented construction technologies to life. With a focus on **eco-friendly innovations** and **cost-effective solutions**, we deliver tailored services to meet the demands of modern architecture

right.content: Talshir-IBC specializes in **unique construction patent solutions**, delivering innovative designs with **worldwide protection**. Our patents cover revolutionary technologies in **sustainable architecture** and **energy-efficient structures**, setting new standards in the industry
